website_summaries.verdict: Delivers up to 104 servings of emergency food that can last up to 25 years.
pros: Robust mix of prepared emergency food to keep you nourished and healthy in the event of a disaster
No cooking required — just add water
We love that the food items include fruits and veggies

website_summaries.verdict: The bucket contains adequate calorie intake and food variety for a family of four for 72 hours, and the shelf life is excellent.
pros: Shelf life of up to 20 years
Food comes in a solid storage container with individual packages inside
Just add water (preferably warm water) to serve
cons: Expensive, and it only lasts for three days (for a family of four)

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging. I have to assume the food inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging. I have to assume the food inside will stay good. If it turns out that in 20 years the world ends and this stuff tastes like crap, you can expect to find a scathing review on here.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Fay

customer_reviews.title: Check your bucket
customer_reviews.text: This is 24 meals, unless you ration it. They boost the serving count with things such as 12 servings of "butter sauce". Make sure you open the bucket to see what's in it, as I was missing a pouch and had to call the company to get one sent. Only two stars because of the missing content, meager serving sizes, and inflating serving count (though at least they published it in the description).
customer_reviews.author: James Avis

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Lousy flavor and minuscle portion sizes. Better off buying dried rice and beans
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Taste was good. Serving size was excellent
customer_reviews.text: Taste was good. Serving size was excellent. Could even stretch to get more than 4 servings a bag, because 4 servings were large. We made it in a covered pot. We were told by the Wise salesman to add a 1/2 cup less water and it came out perfect. We tried the beef stroganoff. Would highly recommend this company for long term and emergency food storage!

customer_reviews.title: Good thing to have on hand just "in case"
customer_reviews.text: This makes my 4th. purchase from Wise Emergency food supply. have not opened the sealed buckets. I have them stored on my "just in case" shelves. My husband is the one that suggested we get the 4th. one. He said you know if there is an emergency and our family or friends needs food we would share with them. Also knowing that the shelf life is 25 years means a lot. It is always better to be safe then sorry. It is kind of like they did years ago when they preserved food by drying and canning, except this takes a lot less room and the shelf life is longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Skaggs

customer_reviews.title: A lot of trouble for nothing
customer_reviews.text: The description says 25 years. The only date I found on the bucket was the date it was packaged. I started to look around and found out some pretty disturbing facts about this product, their testing is questionable. I haven't eaten any of the stuff yet, because they are packaged separately. I was lead to believe that they would be individually package per serving! Not so! How am I going to eat 8 servings of anything in one setting? I will never buy this again. I can't even trust it to be there when I need it the most.
customer_reviews.author: Coconut

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your $
customer_reviews.text: This food is not individually packaged, MUST BE COOKED, and tastes like crap
customer_reviews.author: Adamosity

customer_reviews.title: Poor cooking instructions
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty savvy when it comes to camping and all the details of survival. Directions are very poor and food would not cook (soften) thoroughly. Also, many items had NO instruction how to cook. There was also a lot of different proportions with each of the different items, consistency would be great. Food was edible, but mountain house is far superior....
customer_reviews.author: Beckie

customer_reviews.title: This ugly black and red small bucket was in the small box  I had no ideal what it was
customer_reviews.text: It shows a white bucket like the one my sister got which 5 gallon And the one i got was so small it looks it is about 2 gallons not at all like the picture on line its a ugly red and black 1/3 the size it looks the servings they must be for babies I realize food was on demand but to cut your customer smaller servings
customer_reviews.author: margaret lowry

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've had these before, great product, tastes good and better price than Mountain House. Get them, you won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Holder

customer_reviews.title: Not all items were received.
customer_reviews.text: Waiting for resolution. Received 68 of 104 servings. Have not opened any packages so cannot comment on Flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia W Merritt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: weird ingredients and very little actual food , box is 1/4 full ??
customer_reviews.author: boo

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for emergency rations but I had to dress up ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for emergency rations but I had to dress up some of the meals to make them decent. Basically I just added a cut up chicken breast to the meal, which is still somewhat realistic as in a survival situation you can still hunt meat to supplement this ration.
customer_reviews.author: Everett Eby

customer_reviews.title: Getting prepared for Hurricane Dorian
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bucket of preparedness prior to Hurricane Dorian. Thank heavens we did not need it so can’t comment on taste but came in a nice storage container to add to our supplies. Grateful to have grateful not to need it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast, appears as represented
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because I have not opened it. I am leaving it sealed until I experience a food emergency. The packaging appears as represented though. When ordered in conjunction with the 60 serving meat variety pack, it provides enough calories to sustain me in my activities for 30 days, according to the nutrition information. I will likely re order in the near future to increase my emergency stockpile, as it seems like the most cost effective and space efficient option out there.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: No Expiration Date listed
customer_reviews.text: No expiration date listed on the container, unknown if this is a fresh product, it looks like is mostly cereal and fruits
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product flawless containers. Clearly marked 2044 expiration. Rehydration instructions and nutritional info clearly marked on the label.
customer_reviews.author: Roadkill1730

customer_reviews.title: Ate the pasta alfredo. Liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Boiled water and had dinner in three minutes. Very critical to have a lot of these in the event of natural disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Bradley

customer_reviews.title: High quality in the product!
customer_reviews.text: I have not use the "Emergency" provisions yet and I hope not to. But I can say I think I received what was promised and peace of mind right now means a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Francis E Smith Jr

customer_reviews.title: Meals Taste Great! Rations All in One Place.
customer_reviews.text: My Project Manager suggested the Wise Company brand to replenish our emergency food rations. The extended shelf life will allow us to remain in compliance with a portion our Emergency Preparedness Program and avoids the hassle of individual food item expiration dates. This is a no brainer for work and home.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Richards

customer_reviews.title: Why the 2lb difference in weight between 2 orders a couple of weeks apart?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these a couple of weeks apart, I haven't opened either of them yet but I'm suprised by the difference in weight between the 2. The first one I ordered early February weighs 7lbs 8oz, the second one I ordered end of February weighs 5lbs 5 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good shape. I bought this for my son's family ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape. I bought this for my son's family that live out in the country. I hope they never have to use it, so I can't review the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I haven't had to try these yet but I am glad to have them. They were sent on back order and I appreciate the follow through. Nice to know these are here if we need them. Also comes in a great tub that can be re-used for anything.
customer_reviews.author: ToddAlan1

customer_reviews.title: price
customer_reviews.text: easy to prepare great for a national blackout,i got 25 tubs long live tube
customer_reviews.author: guy k.

customer_reviews.title: Dried food, what can I say. Better to have it and not need it, than to need it and not have it.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping took WAY too long!!!!!! WAYYYY too long!!!!! Haven’t tried it, because I don’t want to break the seal. I will wait for the apocalypse and when that happens I’ll log back in and give a better evaluation.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: H P wireless printer easy set up @ great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer easy setup And a great price !

customer_reviews.title: You never know when you might need this dot-dot-
customer_reviews.text: I only tried one meal and it was adequate and tasty

customer_reviews.title: It arrived fast and looks quality
customer_reviews.text: I havent tried the food but it all looks good!

customer_reviews.title: Emergency supply
customer_reviews.text: We got it as an emergency the price goes up a lot but when you want to be prepared you pay

customer_reviews.title: Came on time which was nice. I did open them as somebody else said ...
customer_reviews.text: Came on time which was nice. I did open them as somebody else said in their review that they were missing packages. All Mine were all there.
customer_reviews.author: Di Guild

customer_reviews.title: Good emergency food storage.
customer_reviews.text: Good emergency food storage. Long extended life and lots of choices.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Weinrich

customer_reviews.title: This item i order for donation
customer_reviews.text: I did buy the product for donation to the other items that i gave for the people of the Bahamas. Hope that whoever gets it. Like it. I can really rate it because i did not try it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipping is too long for a sub-par product
customer_reviews.text: It took 3 months to ship. The food isn't good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received and Matches Description
customer_reviews.text: Haven't sampled this yet, but arrived in a timely manner and product looks like the picture and the review! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: christie radeos

customer_reviews.title: Put your mind at ease
customer_reviews.text: You never know when you will need emergency supplies. Be prepared. Mind is more at ease during Coronavirus.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried any of it yet, it’s my emergency stash but I thought it’s a great price for what you get.

customer_reviews.title: Trust the seller or buy two.
customer_reviews.text: This product is for future use. I cannot sample the actual product without breaking the seal on the bucket.

customer_reviews.title: Buy
customer_reviews.text: I would rate higher if I had opened them but they are for our earthquake stash
customer_reviews.author: mommynurse

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed and ordered.
customer_reviews.text: We haven't opened or tried the product as we purchased it for emergencies, but it appears to be what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: took 3 weeks to receive , in these times
customer_reviews.text: Out back trip canceled, not sure what it tastes like,

customer_reviews.title: Kit energy, wish will never when I use
customer_reviews.text: Like thanks for all look ok the product it is going to be in estore until emergency happen

customer_reviews.title: Buy on Amazon vs Wise
customer_reviews.text: I have bought through the company directly in the past and bombarded with unsolicited calls and emails. The product is a great deal, I'll be buying through Amazon if I need to replace or buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Swan Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great food at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with Wise Survival Foods. Keep up the great work, highly recommended. Will definitely be back. Many thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bair

customer_reviews.title: Well Packaged
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly how described. I tried it and it will definitely will sustain you in the event of emergency.

customer_reviews.title: its okay: its for emergencys only so it doesnt ...
customer_reviews.text: its okay: its for emergencys only so it doesnt have to be any better- I was going to only give 3 starts but did 4 because of the long shelf life. quick shipping: and I would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Bucket of food
customer_reviews.text: It's a bucket of freezedried food. You get what you oay for.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Paschall

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor execution.
customer_reviews.text: The outer container was sealed but the contents were spilled all over inside packages. Not eating anything presented like this.
customer_reviews.author: Camping Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: easy to store and fits perfectly in our supply area
customer_reviews.text: Added to my emergency stockpile, easy to store and fits perfectly in our supply area.

customer_reviews.title: Better than most of the other wise offers
customer_reviews.text: Better than most of the other wise offers. It comes with 104 servings while other buckets of the same size have 60 servings

customer_reviews.title: Food is good, but could use a little more flavor
customer_reviews.text: Food is good, but could use a little more flavor. But that is to be expected with freeze dried food.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Galbach

customer_reviews.title: have not used it yet
customer_reviews.text: got the product just in case of an emergency have not used any of it as of yet. Live in a hurricane prone area and just taking precautions

customer_reviews.title: Glad I have it
customer_reviews.text: Glad I have it, haven't opened it yet so I don't know how it tastes. I was surprised that there is no expiration date on the container.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. My husband and I live in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My husband and I live in the country and this gives us food when not able to go to town due to weather. It is also a great way to camp, no mess, no fuss. Food taste great. Thank you, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brink

customer_reviews.title: Not real happy about it
customer_reviews.text: The amount of food was significantly smaller than i expected. I tried the food as well, and tastes the same as other companies that are cheaper and offer more food. Not real happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to have on hand in case of an emergency. Nice to know there's food if we can't get off the mountain.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Emergency; NOT backpacking
customer_reviews.text: I was unfortunately misled into thinking this was only freeze dried dinners. Comes with unecessary packs of yogurt, fruits and sauce. For storage in a hunting shed, not for camping. Only comes in non-resealable 4 portions pack. (much too big for 1-2 men)
customer_reviews.author: Arnaud Hureau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an emergency
customer_reviews.text: 25 year shelf life. Perfect for an emergency. Never hurts to be prepared. This brings me closer to having a 6 month supply of food in case of any natural disasters, economic breakdown or just for hiking if I need it. Stores well, lasts 25 years, how can you go wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Bran hanson

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: Wise food is the best for long time storage. Planing to buy more soon . Hopping for a qupon or something like that
customer_reviews.author: Mangler

customer_reviews.title: in a good container. It has a nice choice of added ...
customer_reviews.text: Came very quickly, in a good container. It has a nice choice of added fruits and vegetables (32 servings) that I haven't seen elsewhere. I haven't opened it as yet, saving for an emergency, so, I can't say how good it tastes I suppose, so giving it 4 stars. But, I think everyone should have emergency food store now, and this being freeze dried is fresh for a long time. I'd strongly suggest purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rusti_1

customer_reviews.title: The peace of mind is worth it! I'm not ...
customer_reviews.text: The peace of mind is worth it! I'm not going to watch my children go hungry because I didn't feel the necessity to prepare for an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually tasted anything yet, but it did arrive in a timely manner, & appears to be well contained... won't know anything for sure until I actually try it..
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: ... have on hand in case of emergency since it's better to be safe than sorry
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these packs to have on hand in case of emergency since it's better to be safe than sorry! Have not tried any of the foods so I can't speak on the taste but loved the price and long shelf life of this product.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewGal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully this will be consumed at the end of it's storage life instead of some disaster
customer_reviews.author: American Rider

customer_reviews.title: not bad. Probably need to get a bit more
customer_reviews.text: Tried a free sample; not bad. Probably need to get a bit more. This bucket should hold two people for 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kalman

customer_reviews.title: Good shipping, pricing and product.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Was exactly what I expect product to be. Haven't tasted it yet, but in the next crisis I'll let you know about that. Until then glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: GLM

customer_reviews.title: Light and relatively compact.
customer_reviews.text: This case is both smaller and lighter than I had anticipated. That is a good comment. So if that much food can be put into a relatively small area, and kept light weight, that makes it so much easier to pack into a home " bug-out" bag ready for quick grab & go situations. Or for lock-down stay inside your 'castle' type scenarios. Or if you want light weight large quantites of food available for hiking or camping trips, mission treks to other countries. I have not opened or tasted the food, but in an emergency, it should do the trick as I don't hope to be picky at that point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wise Food
customer_reviews.text: Came as promised in good condition. Have not tried it as will be saved for emergency use. Looks to be as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Great supplier, quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great supplier, quick shipping. Have not tried the food as it was intended to be used for emergency. The selection and types of foods were perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Espe

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Box was extremely light for the price so I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Joann di Cristofaro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i am assuming this product is j bought it for future use
customer_reviews.author: Bill Shockley

customer_reviews.title: Food for Life
customer_reviews.text: Great product for emergencies or to use on a weight loss program. Quality is excelent.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Jones, III

customer_reviews.title: Emergency food
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet. Saving for emergency. Nice compact bucket. Smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: FranJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product - Reasonable Price ... makes a nice emergency food kit.  Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet ... live in Florida close to the coast ... wanted this in case of a hurricane in the future (emergency supply of ez to use food). Have not tried the food yet; however, do like the packaging and what I see. Looks like it would be ez to use and reasonably compact - Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Mel

customer_reviews.title: This was bought for my husband, who hikes. ...
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my husband, who hikes. Though I know this wasn't set up for hikers, it would have made it convenient if the servings were portioned out differently. Also, the pudding had no directions as to how to make it.
customer_reviews.author: GDW

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great deal. I will open if I have an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement to other food stores.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as Mountain House freeze dried meals and won't last as long. Nice that they have some veggies and other stuff as well as whey milk. I wouldn't use this as my only food storage, I'd buy some Mountain House Meals as well as they are TASTY and LAST LONG but this is a good supplement with nice veggies, deserts, breakfasts, and milk to supplement other food stores.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am prepared for disaster thanks to Wise. I feel it is wise to buy from Wise.
customer_reviews.author: R. Merl Mason

customer_reviews.title: but feel better knowing that we have it if
customer_reviews.text: I hope we never need this, but feel better knowing that we have it if necessary
customer_reviews.author: John Mcmanus

customer_reviews.title: The zombie apocalypse folks we are not BUT we have a real need to have emergency kits and the like during hurricane season
customer_reviews.text: We are a large family and live in New orleans. The zombie apocalypse folks we are not BUT we have a real need to have emergency kits and the like during hurricane season. We bought this brand this season, only 1 kit to try. Of course we had to break it open and test it. It got a "well it will make a turd" review from the family... and the guys were looking for seconds. Its not the best food you will ever eat but for what its supposed to do... not bad. I think adding some spices to the kit might spruce things up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Praline

customer_reviews.title: Prepared
customer_reviews.text: I received the product in a timely fashion. I appreciate the availability of the product. The product serves as an insurance and assurance policy just in case. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: generaljo

customer_reviews.title: What can I say? I hope I never HAVE ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I hope I never HAVE to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Browning

customer_reviews.title: I have not tasted the food but was disappointed was not as much as I expected it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not tasted the food but was disappointed was not as much as I expected it to be in containers wish there was more supplies for the amount of money but I have no complaints as of yet

customer_reviews.title: good varity
customer_reviews.text: If you are in a bind and ned a quality product this is it.No fuss,no mess.Looks good and tastes fine

customer_reviews.title: Won't know
customer_reviews.text: Until the time comes to open it up and taste it but it seems well packaged and ready to go

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I guess. I haven't had a need to crack open the bucket. But wait, the end times are just around the corner. So check back soon.

product_meta.title: Wise Company Emergency Food Supply, Variety Pack, 25-Year Shelf Life, 104 Servings
feature_bullets: VARIETY PACK - 104 serving complete survival food kit provides a delicious variety of ready-to-eat food including breakfast, lunch, and dinner, fruit, vegetables, snacks, and milk
25 YEAR SHELF LIFE - With a 25-year shelf life, our emergency foods are designed to withstand the test of time, reducing waste and worry when maintaining disaster preparedness kits

MULTI-USE READY TO EAT FOOD - All in one survival food kit can be stored at home or in your vehicle for emergency situations or, individually wrapped pouches can be taken along on hiking, backpacking, and camping trips
GRAB AND GO - Contained in a convenient, easy to store bucket, foods stay safe and secure so they're ready when you need them most
JUST ADD WATER - Easy to prepare in any situation, just add water, wait 12-15 minutes and enjoy delicious, hearty food - no cooking necessary

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
